songs.title: Bring It
songs.lyrics:
Shall I bring shooting
Where you are
If you want me to bring it
I will, I will
You can, You can, You can, You can
Baby Gangsta
You can, You can, You can, You can
Bring it Bring it  Bring it  Bring it Bring it  Bring it
Bring it motherfucker
Yeah Yeah
Baby Gangsta is back
Bring it motherfucker
You can, You can, You can, You can
Bring it back west coast!
Bring it Bring it  Bring it  Bring it Bring it  Bring it
Baby G
You can

Baby Gangsta
Bring it back west coast!
This is the real fucking type of shit that I write
Running and heckling cause
Type of guns that I buy
He think your shit is weak
You be the next one on the stretcher
Stay ready in LA
Cause niggas will test ya
War is  built around
To the league of chess board
Thinking  to myself
Why he got his vest on
Every killing thought and  instinct
I ask for
Yeah the thought the bow wow
Guns  on the dashboard
Each generation gets worse
And that’s a given
Niggas don’t give a fuck
They killing for a living
Don’t know much
About the work force
But I can work my magic
With this cratchet
You like come to parlor
Mama snatch it

Go ahead and  try to creep
Never sleep
I keep that bomb heat
Cause nigga I”m street
Like concrete
Fuck this broke ass group
Of youngsters
Loc get out of line
And you’re going to meet
My arson note  nigga

You can, You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
Baby Gangsta
You can, You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
You can, You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it

You can, You can

You can, You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
If you want me to
I will
You can, You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it

When you talking that bullshit
Be  ready for a fist fight
Let’s get high cuz
Niggas might die tonight
When you sticking your chest out
Trying to front for some bitches
I’m gonna crack you with a bottle
You gonna need some stitches
Didn’t want to do it
But when you provoke that shit
That’s when I knock your ass out
Then I stump you bitches
Motherfuckers go to running
Like I was dumping that shit
That’s when I grab the barstool
And crack you over your head

When the beat get hot
You know it escalated
You niggas better run for more
Than a escalator
Hot shots they
Melting  goop
From a nigga’s toupee
Motherfucker is four
He’s no looking for ways
Those days is over
Better learn to stay sober
Four ways you turned it over
Flipped that ?
Big man the  boys
Over Spokane
California better
Watch your back
And don’t let me creep on you

You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
I will bring it where you are
If you want me to
I will
You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it

I hear a lot of big talk
But niggas break your merk
One head to the  chirp
Had your face with a shirt
Think they gonna bring it
To them case start singing
Niggas
Ears start ringing
Now you’re laid out bleeding
Fuck a meeting
We’re sending holiday greetings
Home invasion
Duct tape
This is California creeping
Stop you from breathing
Bang your ass up easy
Those niggas ain’t beating you up
Busy as a priest is

From the hub to the dub
Watch to the finish
My niggas sand force killers
And cap pillas
You niggas showing your grill
This shit is real
The still will make it hard for
Your nigga to eat a meal
The west is back
Cower niggas fall back
That a bunch of brains
Leaves ya fifty capped
These hot shells
Will make your niggas laugh
You niggas ain’t half
Of what you write in your rap

You can, You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
You can, You can
BG Knocc Out
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
You can, You can

You can, You can

You can, You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it
You can, You can

Yeah, yeah,  yeah,   yeah
BG is back!
You can, You can
Bring it, bring it, bring it,  bring it,  bring it

Baby Gangsta is back!
